name: Knight Club - Alpha Demo
description:
So this is just an alpha demo for Knight Club. Don't expect everything to work. It features 3 game modes, a bunch of levels, and probably a lot of bugs. This will never be updated ever again. 

You should play this with controllers.

If you don't have controllers, you can play 2 players on 1 keyboard. Welcome to hell. Here are the buttons. (get a controller)

Player 1
Enter = Start
J = Attack/Enter
K = Jump/Cancel
L = Dash
I = Shield

WASD to move/aim  your attacks.

Player 2
Enter = Right Shift
Numpad 4 = Attack/Enter
Numpad 5 = Jump/Cancel
Numpad 6 = Dash
Numpad 8 = Shield

Arrow keys to move around.

Listen I cant stress this enough. Use a controller. Please. Dear god please.
